message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe holds significant value. While I can't disclose specific details at this time, I'm confident it could be a game-changer for the right individual. My asking price is $1500000. I understand this is a significant investment, but I'm confident the potential return will justify the price.  If you're interested, I'd be happy to schedule a meeting to discuss the details further. Please let me know your thoughts.
